game.name: Pony Dress Up
game.description:
Like everyone else, animals also need some love and care no matter what purpose you have to deal with them. Today we have got you covered with a brand new girls game where you will meet a cute pony who needs your guidance to grab some cool outfits. Would you come forward to give your helping hands to this cute animal? Join Pony Dress Up and be prepared to clean, brush and get him ready before leaving the home! Feel free to customize it as per your taste and requirements!

You are the best friend of pony and have taken the responsibility of providing him with the optimum possible care. Begin this html5 animal fun challenge by rinsing him with some water! Then use a towel to wipe him out properly. It looks he is very dirty so use a brush to remove all the dirt from his body and then untangle the hair using a comb. Do not forget to bush his hooves and then get ready to customize him as per your need to make him magical and cute.

He looks fabulous if you add some colorful wings and color its body, a saddle and a harness with some spots. Give his forehead a wonderful unicorn horn and add some fun tattoos on his elegant body in this cool make-up game! Customize his tail and mane and take a chance to add some lovely feathers or bows! Give him a tattoo shaped like a butterfly or a star! Modify his color eyes as per your desire! All the best to have a blast in our classy and popular animal dressing games for girls, no download required!
